```{r, include = FALSE}
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"

```

```{r setup}
library("sankey")
```

```{r}
# Example data
strokedata <- read.csv("../data/extdata/strokedata.csv")
dd <- strokedata[c(1:5, 5), c(1:6, 5)]
dd[6, "factors"] <- "Random"
names(dd)[7] <- 2015
names(dd)[1] <- "Type"
plot_sankey(dd,
            title = "Risk Factors for Stroke in Blacks",
            xgap = 0.5, ygap = .005)
```
